name: Dreamsong
description:
A tiny point and click story about going to sleep to retrieve a song you dreamed of and couldn't remember on waking. Based on a dream I had and also on having lost the most beautiful song I've ever known at 16. I made everything out of felt and it was fun to use my hands and also to keep returning to the fabric shop to buy tiny colourful felt squares - the owner was very intrigued. I'd go and show her but she's probably forgotten. Thanks to Jon Weasley for the sweetest tunes and ideas!

<3 

//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

Instructions:

Click on things! Get to the end! Better with headphones!

Tip: read first then click
